2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate and FY 2025-2026 City Budget

 08-07-2025
By Resolution 2025-06-R, August 6, 2025, City Council approved a Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000. This rate is the same tax rate as 2024. 
Ordinance 2025-18_Adopted 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate
Ordinance 2025-17_Adopted FY 2025-2026 City Budget

**CANCELED** November 4, 2025 Special Election

 07-24-2025
PROPOSITION A:  Shall the San Antonio Metropolitan Transit Authority be continued in the City of Saint Hedwig?
PROPOSITION B:  (Conditional upon a Majority Vote of "NO" on Proposition A) The adoption of a sales and use tax at the rate of two percent (2%) in the City of Saint Hedwig
2025-20_ORDINANCE_Cancelling the November 4, 2025 Special Election

New Precinct 4 Satellite Office

 04-29-2025

Bexar Appraisal District 2025 Notices of Appraised Value

 04-11-2025

On April 11, 2025, the Bexar Appraisal District (BCAD) mailed the 2025 Notices of Appraised
Value to new property owners and to those whose property market value has increased by
$1,000 or more compared to the previous year. Property owners have until May 15, 2025,
or 30 days after receiving their notice to appeal their appraised value.

Appeals can be submitted in person, by mail, or online using the Online Services Portal at www.bcad.org.

For assistance with filing an appeal or for more information, contact BCAD at 210-242-2432 or https://help.bcad.org.

CANCELATION OF MAY 3, 2025 GENERAL ELECTION

 04-07-2025
SAINT HEDWIG'S MAY 3, 2025 GENERAL ELECTION IS CANCELED. THE FOLLOWING CANDIDATES HAVE BEEN CERTIFIED AS UNOPPOSED AND ARE HEREBY ELECTED AS FOLLOWS:

City Council Place 1 - Dwayne Padalecki, Incumbent, Unopposed
City Council Place 3 - Caid Frankowiak, Incumbent, Unopposed
City Council Place 5 - John E. Hafner, Incumbent, Unopposed

RESOLUTION 2025-03-R_ORDER OF CANCELATION

Purchase and Installation of a stand by Generator Bidding Information

 03-05-2025
The City of Saint Hedwig Texas is soliciting Request For Proposal (RFP) for purchase and installation of a 60 KW Diesel stand by Generator. 
The city will be using a Competitive Sealed Proposal (CSP) bid process.
The Contract will be awarded based on BEST VALUE between the City and the top-ranked contractor.
The project includes the purchasing, and complete installation of a 60 kw diesel generator
Project Package
Due March 28, 2025 at 3:00 pm
For more information contact the City Manager
210-667-9568

DRAFT FUTURE LAND USE PLAN
DRAFT FUTURE LAND USE MAP

Truck Route Ordinance 2025-04

 02-11-2025

THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS. ORDINANCE NO. 2025-04. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS, REGULATING TRUCK TRAFFIC ON PUBLIC STREETS DESIGNATED AS NO THROUGH TRUCK STREETS; PROVIDING FOR INSTALLATION OF SIGNS; PROVIDING FOR PENALTIES; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABLITY; AND PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE. Any person who violates any provision of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction, shall be fined not more than five hundred ($500.00) dollars. Any law enforcement officer is hereby authorized to issue a citation for violations of this article. To see complete ordinance, visit the City of Saint Hedwig website, sainthedwigcity.com. PASSED AND APPROVED the 5th day of February, 2025.
VIEW ORDINANCE 2025-04

Truck Route Map

Volunteer Opportunities

 01-17-2025

Future Land Use Plan Update Open House

 01-13-2025

Help Envision Saint Hedwig’s Future

January 23

The City of Saint Hedwig is nearing the end of the process to update the Future Land Use Plan element of the City’s Master Plan.
An open house will be held at City Hall to present the proposed amendments to the Future Land Use Plan & Map and gather feedback from citizens.

The open house meeting will be held on
January 23rd, 2025, from 6-8pm, at
City Hall - 13065 FM 1346.

Citizens are invited to attend this meeting and encouraged to participate in the sharing of ideas about the future of Saint Hedwig.

For more information contact
City Hall at (210) 667-9568

NOTICE OF POSSIBLE QUORUM

2024 CHRISTMAS TREE LIGHTING CEREMONY

 11-14-2024

Second Place:  The Christmas Lollipop Girls: Jennifer, Shelby & Stevie Vance (Tree #11)

Budget & Tax Rate

 11-11-2024
THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERTATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY -0.12 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $0.00

Adopted 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate_Ordinance 2024-11
Adopted FY 2024-2025 City Budget_Ordinance 2024-10
9/12/24 Public Hearing Notice (Proposed Budget & Tax Rate)

City Manager Maria Hernandez

Am I a Resident of the City of Saint Hedwig?

 07-12-2024
If you have a Saint Hedwig address,
click link below to determine if you are a:
1. Resident of the City of Saint Hedwig, residing inside the city limits
2. Non-resident, residing outside the city limits, within the City's ETJ (extraterritorial jurisdiction)
CLICK HERE

Outdoor Burning

 07-11-2024

OUTDOOR BURNING WITHIN THE SAINT HEDWIG CITY LIMITS

Outdoor burning is allowed within the Saint Hedwig city limits per Ordinance 2022-27.
No permit is required, but residents are required to follow Bexar County burning regulations
as posted on the Bexar County Fire Marshal website

Ordinance 2022-27

Mayor Dee Grimm

 05-09-2024

Truck Route Ordinance 2025-04

THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS. ORDINANCE NO. 2025-04. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS, REGULATING TRUCK TRAFFIC ON PUBLIC STREETS DESIGNATED AS NO THROUGH TRUCK STREETS; PROVIDING FOR INSTALLATION OF SIGNS; PROVIDING FOR PENALTIES; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABLITY; AND PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE. Any person who violates any provision of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction, shall be fined not more than five hundred ($500.00) dollars. Any law enforcement officer is hereby authorized to issue a citation for violations of this article. PASSED AND APPROVED the 5th day of February, 2025.

STAR PARTY

OBSERVE THE NIGHT SKY AND LEARN ABOUT CONSTELLATIONS AND THE PLANETS!
Presented by the San Antonio Astronomical Association
And The City of Saint Hedwig

Take turns looking through telescopes brought by local astronomers and see the Constellations and Jupiter.
To find out what will be in the sky on Saturday March 2, 2024 click below
https://nightsky.jpl.nasa.gov/event-view.cfm?Event_ID=137737 
             What to Bring:                                                                             
             Please bring a Red-Light Flashlight                                             
             BYOC- Bring your own chair                                                   
             Dress for the weather                                                                                       

                March 2, 2024
                6:30 to 8:30 PM
                Saint Hedwig City Park
                13065 FM 1346
For more information call City Hall  210-667-9568 

Road Closed to Thru Traffic

The City of Saint Hedwig is going to be Repairing a Culvert on N. Graytown Rd
Between Mihlski Ln and N. Lupon
And will be closing the street for traffic beginning
Monday, January 8th, 2024.
Please follow the detour map if traveling on this area
If you have any questions call City Hall 210-667-9568

                      Thank you
Detour Map
